name: Insufficient Storage (Petipois)
description:
Insufficient Storage

Inside the world of SD Card and Mobile Phones
Destroy the files clogging up your phone and memory card
Send them to the cloud
Save the Storage Space!!!!

You are 32GB SD Card, you need to clear the junk/cache from your phone. You accomplish this  by throwing GB at oncoming files. Try to use them wisely!

Controls

WASD - Move

Mouse/Click - Aim/Throw GB
